abstract.t: Virtual Private Networks (VPNs) based on Frame Relay or ATM circuitshave been around a long time. While these VPNs work well, the costsof maintaining separate networks for Internet traffic and VPNs andthe administrative burden of provisioning these VPNs have led ServiceProviders to look for alternative solutions. In this document, wereview the good and bad of Layer 2 VPNs, and what it would take tomake them viable to a Service Provider.
